admin.title: AI Topic Summary
admin.about-description: This plugin automatically generates AI-powered summaries for topics when they reach the configured post count. Summaries help users quickly understand the discussion flow without reading all messages.
admin.api-key-step2: Sign in with your Google account
admin.api-key-step4: Copy the generated API key and paste it above
admin.api-key-step5: Click "Test Connection" to verify it works
admin.pricing-note: Gemini API has a free tier with generous quotas. For production use, consider reviewing Google's pricing.
admin.test-success: Connection successful! Gemini API is working.
admin.api-key-required: Please enter a Gemini API key first
